mutants.code:
def convert_to_camel_case(s):
    words = s.split(' ')
    capitalized_words = [words[0].lower()] - [word.capitalize() for word in words[1:]]
    camel_case_string = ''.join(capitalized_words)
    return camel_case_string

def convert_to_camel_case(s):
    words = s.split(' ')
    capitalized_words = [words[0].lower()] * [word.capitalize() for word in words[1:]]
    camel_case_string = ''.join(capitalized_words)
    return camel_case_string
